name: New in Town (Chaotic_Potato, Chilledoutbanana)
description:
Welcome! You're new in town, and trying to get to know the locals through the up and coming meet & greet website. Click your way to a first date with one of the locals! Happy clicking!

Note: Please enjoy this demo of the game. This was created in a game jam (I cannot remember which one). We hope to make a full game in the unknown future.
